db:abstract.db:para: The QScxmlEvent class is an event for a Qt SCXML state machine.
This class was introduced in Qt 5.7.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: SCXML events drive transitions. Most events are generated by using the <raise> and <send> elements in the application. The state machine automatically generates some mandatory events, such as errors.
For more information, see SCXML Specification - 5.10.1 The Internal Structure of Events. For more information about how the Qt SCXML API differs from the specification, see SCXML Compliance.

db:section.db:title: enum QScxmlEvent::EventType
db:section.db:para: This enum type specifies the type of an SCXML event:

db:td.db:para: An event generated internally by the state machine. For example, errors.
An event generated by a <raise> element.
An event generated by a <send> element.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] data : const QVariant
db:section.db:para: This property holds the data included by the sender.

When <param> elements are used in the <send> element, the data will contain a QVariantMap where the key is the name attribute, and the value is taken from the expr attribute or the location attribute.
When a <content> element is used, the data will contain a single item with either the value of the expr attribute of the <content> element or the child data of the <content> element.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] eventType : const QString
db:section.db:para: This property holds the type of the event.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] invokeId : const QString
db:section.db:para: This property holds the ID of the invoked state machine if the event is generated by one.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] name : const QString
db:section.db:para: This property holds the name of the event.
If the event is generated inside the SCXML document, this property holds the value of the event attribute specified inside the <raise> or <send> element.

If the event is created in the C++ code and submitted to the QScxmlStateMachine, the value of this property is matched against the value of the event attribute specified inside the <transition> element in the SCXML document.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] origin : const QString
db:section.db:para: This property holds the URI that points to the origin of an SCXML event.
The origin is equivalent to the target attribute of the <send> element.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] originType : const QString
db:section.db:para: This property holds the origin type of an SCXML event.
The origin type is equivalent to the type attribute of the <send> element.

db:section.db:title: [read-only] sendId : const QString
db:section.db:para: This property holds the ID of the event.
The ID is used by the <cancel> element to identify the event to be canceled.

db:note.db:para: The state machine generates a unique ID if the id attribute is not specified in the <send> element. The generated ID can be accessed through this property.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlEvent::QScxmlEvent()
db:section.db:para: Creates a new external SCXML event.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlEvent::QScxmlEvent(const QScxmlEvent &other)
db:section.db:para: Constructs a copy of other.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QScxmlEvent::~QScxmlEvent()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the SCXML event.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::clear()
db:section.db:para: Clears the contents of the event.

db:section.db:title: QVariant QScxmlEvent::data() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the data included by the sender.

db:section.db:title: int QScxmlEvent::delay() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the delay in milliseconds after which this event is to be delivered after processing the <send> element.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::errorMessage() const
db:section.db:para: If this is an error event, returns the error message. Otherwise, returns an empty QString.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlEvent::EventType QScxmlEvent::eventType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the type of this event.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::invokeId() const
db:section.db:para: If this event is generated by an invoked state machine, returns the ID of the <invoke> element. Otherwise, returns an empty value.

db:section.db:title: bool QScxmlEvent::isErrorEvent() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true when this is an error event, false otherwise.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::name() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the name of the event.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::origin() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a URI that points to the origin of an SCXML event.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::originType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the origin type of an SCXML event.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::scxmlType() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the event type.

db:section.db:title: QString QScxmlEvent::sendId() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the ID of the event.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setData(const QVariant &data)
db:section.db:para: Sets the payload data to data.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setDelay(int delayInMiliSecs)
db:section.db:para: Sets the delay in milliseconds as the value of delayInMiliSecs.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setErrorMessage(const QString &message)
db:section.db:para: If this is an error event, the message is set as the error message.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setEventType(const QScxmlEvent::EventType &type)
db:section.db:para: Sets the event type to type.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setInvokeId(const QString &invokeid)
db:section.db:para: Sets the ID of an invoked state machine to invokeid.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setName(const QString &name)
db:section.db:para: Sets the name of the event to name.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setOrigin(const QString &origin)
db:section.db:para: Sets the origin of an SCXML event to origin.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setOriginType(const QString &origintype)
db:section.db:para: Sets the origin type of an SCXML event to origintype.

db:section.db:title: void QScxmlEvent::setSendId(const QString &sendid)
db:section.db:para: Sets the ID sendid for this event.

db:section.db:title: QScxmlEvent &QScxmlEvent::operator=(const QScxmlEvent &other)
db:section.db:para: Assigns other to this SCXML event and returns a reference to this SCXML event.
